1623520.name: Tower of Cards
1623520.description:
Tower of Cards is a deck building tower defense game. Collect cards by playing against others, playing with others, or just play by yourself.
Build unique decks to take on other players, or survive as long as possible. Choose a commander and build your deck around the commanders archetype. Rather that is decks more focused on offensive units to overwhelm your opponents, or a deck focused on creating an ironclad defense from anything breaking through is up to you.

Demo Features


  • Over 50+ cards to build decks from
  • 3 commanders to build your decks around
  • 12+ Towers to add to your deck.
  • Solo play, Coop play, or versus play.
  • Player progression system
